title: Task 22

question.text: What does Tom mean when he says Yes, I love it but I'm only practicing?

answers.feedback: Practicing usually means you're still learning, not that you're a professional.

answers.answer: He is learning and trying to get better at photography.

answers.feedback: If Tom loves it, it means he likes photography.
There is no information suggesting he is teaching photography.

description: When you are practicing, you are doing an activity regularly to improve your skills at it.
